main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright light in the sky that appeared to maneuver intelligently in Waynesville, Ohio, in August 1965.
interesting points: The witness described the object as emitting light rays and being stationary at times before suddenly accelerating,The sighting involved a neighbor who also observed the object,The witness expressed skepticism but felt the sighting was significant enough to report,The report includes a reference to earlier experiences with unidentified flying objects,The object was not identifiable as any known aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: A civilian observer and a neighbor
